content:
Here's a possible content outline for the article "How to Apply for an Extension of Time in Writing," targeting contractors:

| Heading | Word Count | Tag |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Introduction | 100 | H1 |
| Understanding the Need for Written Requests | 200 | H2 |
| Key Elements of a Written Extension of Time Request | 400 | H2 |
| - Additional Days Needed | 100 | H3 |
| - Details of Delay | 100 | H3 |
| - Supporting Evidence | 100 | H3 |
| - Steps Taken to Avoid Delay | 100 | H3 |
| - Updated Completion Schedule | 100 | H3 |
| Tips for Writing an Effective Extension Request | 300 | H2 |
| - Be Clear and Concise | 100 | H3 |
| - Provide Accurate Information | 100 | H3 |
| - Use Professional Language and Tone | 100 | H3 |
| - Follow Contract Requirements | 100 | H3 |
| Conclusion | 100 | H1 |

The total word count for the article outline is approximately 1,100 words. This can be adjusted based on the specific details and depth of information included in each section.
